channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report E-2023110015
item.description:
Report E-2023110015

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A 55gal poly drum of UN1790 Hydrofluoric acid not more than 60% was punctured by a forklift on a trailer. A Contractor was called to assist in the cleanup of material.
